template<class Matrix, class Vector, class Preconditioner, class Real>
int BiCG (  const Matrix &  A,
Vector &  x,
const Vector &  b,
const Preconditioner &  M,
int &  max_iter,
Real &  tol
) 
  

00027 {
00028   Real resid;
00029   Vector rho_1(1), rho_2(1), alpha(1), beta(1);
00030   Vector z, ztilde, p, ptilde, q, qtilde;
00031 
00032   Real normb = norm(b);
00033   Vector r = b - A * x;
00034   Vector rtilde = r;
00035 
00036   if (normb == 0.0)
00037     normb = 1;
00038   
00039   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00040     tol = resid;
00041     max_iter = 0;
00042     return 0;
00043   }
00044 
00045   for (int i = 1; i <= max_iter; i++) {
00046     z = M.solve(r);
00047     ztilde = M.trans_solve(rtilde);
00048     rho_1(0) = dot(z, rtilde);
00049     if (rho_1(0) == 0) { 
00050       tol = norm(r) / normb;
00051       max_iter = i;
00052       return 2;
00053     }
00054     if (i == 1) {
00055       p = z;
00056       ptilde = ztilde;
00057     } else {
00058       beta(0) = rho_1(0) / rho_2(0);
00059       p = z + beta(0) * p;
00060       ptilde = ztilde + beta(0) * ptilde;
00061     }
00062     q = A * p;
00063     qtilde = A.trans_mult(ptilde);
00064     alpha(0) = rho_1(0) / dot(ptilde, q);
00065     x += alpha(0) * p;
00066     r -= alpha(0) * q;
00067     rtilde -= alpha(0) * qtilde;
00068 
00069     rho_2(0) = rho_1(0);
00070     if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) < tol) {
00071       tol = resid;
00072       max_iter = i;
00073       return 0;
00074     }
00075   }
00076 
00077   tol = resid;
00078   return 1;
00079 }
